name: Running Robot
description:
Simple plateformer.

Objective:  Collect all the coins and quickly finish the level.

This game have 1 level and 3 abilities (to collect on the way)

Game works only on windows 64bits

You can subscribe to my youtube channel to receive news on my future creations.
